1379350.name: Frogworld
1379350.description:
Experience a day in the life of a common bullfrog.

Your home environment is being polluted. The very water in which you live is becoming poisonous to the touch. To live another day, you will need to find a new, healthier ecosystem.

The journey will not be easy! Your creek is home to many natural predators and other obstacles–-all of which you will need to pass to find your new home.

It’s a big day for a little frog.

--

Frogworld is the first release from NatureSims, an indie studio dedicated to building first-person VR experiences that bring users closer to nature. Please note that the game requires a compatible VR headset and SteamVR to be installed on your computer for the headset and controllers to work properly.
1379350.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
